EmailTemplate.subject: We want to hear from you
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, A Continuously improving our customers’ experience remains one of NCR’s top priorities. That is why we take your feedback seriously and are asking you to complete the NCR Customer Satisfaction Survey 2022. You will receive a survey link from customer.success@feedback.ncr.com in the next few days. Based on the feedback received during the most recent survey, we have: - Continued to improve our support capabilities, incident resolution, and response times - Allocated resources to simplify the customer experience and emphasize service excellence and seamless execution - Focused on standardizing our solutions for better distribution, quality, and availability - Continued to innovate by extending our digital capabilities and our NCR as a Service offers We encourage you to participate in our NCR Customer Satisfaction Survey 2022 and share your open and honest feedback with us. Your feedback is essential for improving our offerings, which can help you run your business better. Thank you for being an NCR customer. I look forward to hearing from you. Best regards, Frank M.
